Title: Microsoft 365: SMTP onboarding to App Role Based Access Control
Description: We're simplifying how organizations grant applications permission to send email on behalf of mailboxes. Today, customers must manually assign permissions to each individual mailbox using PowerShell, which is time-consuming and inefficient. With this new capability, admins can assign the SMTP.SendAsApp role to an app through App Role-Based Access Control (RBAC), enabling group-based or scoped access to mailboxes. This eliminates the need for per-mailbox configuration and streamlines onboarding fo...

Title: Microsoft Viva: Unread News Notifications in Connections
Description:
Users will receive a weekly notification in the Connections apps in Microsoft Teams on mobile and desktop linking them to relevant SharePoint news that they might have missed in the preceding week. This unread news will be available in the "News" tab in the Connections app under the "unread" pill.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Immersive Search
Description:
After completing a search in Outlook, a user will see a Copilot entry point that will take them to an LLM generated summary of their search query (emails, Teams messages and documents) within their Copilot side pane. They will be able to interact further with Copilot to dig deeper into these results and take action items accordingly.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: News AI audio briefing in Connections Mobile
Description:
This feature provides an AI generated audio overview of top 10 news items in the Viva Connections news reader experience. It plays the 10 audio clips sequentially to help users catch up on top news in a hands-free manner. This experience will be available in the Viva Connections App in Teams mobile on iOS and android.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Easier access to Researcher in Microsoft Word
Description:
The Researcher agent now has easier entry points on the Word canvas —making it faster to go from idea to polished research report without breaking your flow.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Easier access to Researcher in Microsoft Word
Description:
The Researcher agent now has easier entry points on the Word canvas —making it faster to go from idea to polished research report without breaking your flow.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Delete survey cycles
Description:
This feature enables Glint Admins to delete survey cycles within a configured program. When a cycle is deleted, all associated data—including reporting—will be removed from the platform. The feature is intended for removing obsolete or test cycles that are no longer needed.
GA date: October CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): New file extension for Copilot pages
Description: We are introducing a new file extension for Copilot pages, ".page". This new file extension will continue to support admin toggles, sensitivity labels, data loss prevention, multi-geo, Purview eDiscovery, version history, export, audit logs, and data subject requests. The functionality and support for the .page file extension will be identical to the existing .loop file extension, with the only difference being the file extension and the associated file icon.  For a comprehensive list of feature...

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft 365 Copilot app for GCC-M environments
Description:
The Microsoft 365 app will be updated to the Microsoft 365 Copilot app for GCC-M environments. This update includes a UI refresh and quick access to key modules like Chat, Search, Create, Apps, and Notebooks.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: DLP Policy Tip Support in Outlook Mobile
Description:
DLP policy tip support for Outlook Mobile enhances data loss prevention measures on mobile devices by providing real-time alerts to help users avoid accidentally sharing sensitive information, ensuring compliance with organizational policies.
GA date: January CY2026

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Agents in Copilot Chat available on Edge Sidebar
Description:
Use agents in Copilot Chat on Edge Sidebar to simplify tasks.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Excel: Python in Excel for the web (GCC)
Description: After further review, we need to roll this back. We apologize for any inconvenience. Python in Excel allows you to bring the capabilities of Python directly into the Excel grid. As a part of this feature release, eligible users with access to Excel for the web will be able to add Python formulas directly into their workbooks without any installation required. These Python formulas will be run by Excel in a secure container on the Microsoft Cloud with enterprise-level security as a compliant Micr...

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Designer is now part of Copilot, enhanced with new template and slide suggestions
Description:
Designer is now part of Copilot. Copilot suggestions now brings you familiar Designer slide layout and presentation template suggestions in a vertical gallery, along with new capabilities.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service for retroactive updates
Description:
This feature will introduce an alternative solution to the existing Advanced Configurations feature that allows an Admin to retroactively update simpler attribute scenarios associated to surveys. This alternate provides a friendly user experience in a new wizard format - and as well as offering the option to perform the feature with zero file uploads.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for M365 Copilot
Description:
Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities in government cloud environments that help secure and govern data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance. These capabilities will be available once Microsoft 365 Copilot is deployed.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Network Strength icon to understand strength of your network
Description:
Quickly understand strength of your network along with suggestions to conserve bandwidth if you are experiencing networking issues.
GA date: October CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Microsoft 365 Groups scoping in Teams DLP policy extend protection to 1:1/n chats
Description: When scoping policies to Microsoft 365 Groups in Teams DLP policies, members of Teams standard and shared channel chats associated with the groups are currently protected by the policies. This change will automatically extend the protection to standard/shared channels chats in other Microsfot 365 Groups and 1:1/n (non-channel) chats. There is no longer a need to add users, security groups or other Microsoft 365 groups to protect these chats, except for customers that have enabled optical charact...

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Graph Connectors in CIQ
Description:
We mistakenly marked this roadmap as "launched." We apologize for any inconvenience. When grounding your prompts in BizChat, you will be able to use CIQ to scope to your 3P data from your Graph Connectors.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365: Multi-admin change notifications for Microsoft 365 Backup
Description:
Set of pre-defined administrators can be configured to receive email notifications for any potentially damaging changes to the backup settings or actions taken to ensure proper oversight of the tool in the organization.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

Title: Universal Print: Pull Print queues
Description:
Pull Print enables IT Pros to offer their end users a simplified view of the print solution. Specifically, IT Pros can set up virtualized printer(s) so that end users only need to know the name of one printer. Those users can securely release their own print jobs at any associated printer, depending on the setup.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

Title: SharePoint: Signed Adobe & Docusign documents saved to the originating folder
Description:
Documents signed via Adobe or DocuSign eSignature, when initiated through the SharePoint eSignature platform, will now be saved in the originating SharePoint folder instead of the default Apps folder. The originating folder is the folder where the starting document was located at the point of eSignature request initiation.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: [Data Loss Prevention] - [Admin units support for SharePoint Online]
Description:
Delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC). For example, German investigators should be able to investigate alerts and audit events for only German users. This update extends support to SharePoint for Microsoft 365.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Setting to pin M365 Copilot app to Windows taskbar
Description:
This feature allows Global and Intune administrators to pin the M365 Copilot app to the Windows taskbar, providing users with easy access to M365 Copilot capabilities like Chat, Search, Agents, Notebooks and Create. This setting applies to all Intune-managed Windows 10 and 11 devices with the app installed.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Entra: Improved Backup and Restore Experience for the Authenticator App on iOS
Description:
Users of the Microsoft Authenticator app on iOS will be able to back up account names—including Microsoft work or school accounts, Microsoft personal accounts, and third-party accounts like Amazon or Google—using iCloud and iCloud Keychain. This enables secure, end-to-end encrypted backup of account names and TOTP credentials. When setting up a new iOS device, account names will automatically appear in the app, and users can sign in to complete setup.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: S...

Title: Outlook: Account Manager
Description:
Users can use the new Account Manager feature to learn more about their Microsoft account, display their profile picture, and add new accounts (if permitted by their organization).
GA date: August CY2025

Title: SharePoint: Text Editor Copilot 'Refine' update
Description:
SharePoint is updating the capabilities of its text editor Copilot. Now, you can not only use copilot to rewrite your existing text but also use it to keep writing or add a grounding document. By answering the question "what do you want copilot to change", you can perform any number of refinements to your existing content.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Copilot to rephrase text as desired through custom prompt in PowerPoint
Description:
Now you will be able to rewrite text using Copilot through natural language prompting in PowerPoint.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Copilot to rephrase text as desired through custom prompt in PowerPoint
Description:
Now you will be able to rewrite text using Copilot through natural language prompting in PowerPoint.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365 admin center: new scenarios enabling in Microsoft 365 Monitoring
Description:
Microsoft Entra monitoring in Microsoft 365 admin center’s Service Health Dashboard is updated with additional organization level monitoring.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Usability and privacy improvements for live captions and live transcript in meetings
Description: Introducing enhancements to live captions and live transcripts in Microsoft Teams to make meetings more intuitive, accessible, and privacy-focused. Live captions are now scrollable, allowing users to review past conversation with more flexibility and over a larger surface area. Next, copying captions is disabled by default to protect sensitive information and support compliance. Additionally, the live transcript panel won’t open automatically with features that trigger transcription—like recordi...

Title: Microsoft Teams: Slash commands for apps
Description:
You can now interact with your favorite apps directly from Teams chat and channels compose box using slash commands. Type / and start interacting with Apps and Agents, invoke workflows and more.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Outlook: Report junk + block or unsubscribe in one same action
Description:
We’re making it easier to keep your inbox clean and under control. Now, when you report an email as junk, you’ll also have the option to unsubscribe—if that’s available. This helps stop unwanted messages at the source and keeps your blocked list from getting overloaded. If unsubscribing isn’t possible, you’ll still be able to block the sender to prevent future emails. This update gives you more control and a simpler way to manage unwanted messages.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Cloud Attachments preservation for users on hold
Description:
Enables cloud attachment preservation for users put on infinite hold so that file versions shared are preserved across any OneDrive or SharePoint site. This is a new capability which is different from the existing capability of applying label to cloud attachments and links present in OneDrive and SharePoint and shared in Exchange, Teams, Viva Engage and Copilot
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Default Teams Calling global policy to enable users to transcribe or record calls
Description: We’re updating the default global calling policy for new tenants to allow users to transcribe or record calls. Previously, these settings were turned off by default in the host global policy. With this update, recording and transcription will be enabled by default in the global calling policy for new tenants and existing tenants who have not modified the host global policy. This change will not impact existing custom policies or modified global policies. After this rollout, recording and transcr...

Title: Microsoft SharePoint: New web part for FAQs
Description:
SharePoint FAQ web part help assist content owners keep their content fresh and relevant. Powered by Microsoft 365 Copilot, this new web part can help content owner easily curate FAQ by working with agents and connected grounding data. With a Human-in-the-Loop approach, it ensures high-quality, trustworthy FAQs—without the hassle. The result? A living FAQ that evolves with your organization's needs.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Enhanced Meeting Protection - Prevent Screen Capture
Description: To address the issue of unauthorized screen captures during meetings, the Prevent Screen Capture feature ensures that if a user attempts to take a screen capture, the meeting window will turn black, thereby protecting sensitive information. This feature will be available on Teams desktop applications (both Windows and Mac) and Teams mobile applications (both iOS and Android). For users joining from unsupported platforms, they will be placed in audio-only mode to maintain the integrity of the mee...

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft 365 Copilot Search
Description:
Simple to use AI-powered enterprise search experience that quickly surfaces relevant information using work data you have access to.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: SharePoint: Improved processing status experience for Content AI models in SharePoint Online
Description: We’re introducing a new activity pane in SharePoint Online to help users track and troubleshoot Content AI model processing. Starting with document translation and autofill, users will be able to view real-time status (in progress, completed, failed) for individual files, bulk selections, or the full library. Completed status will include enriched details like language codes, glossary usage, and column extraction counts. This new pane will eventually replace the current “processing status” colum...

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Enhancements to global exclusions in IRM settings
Description: In this update, we are making the below enhancements to IRM exclusions to reduce alert noise. 1. Keyword logic update for email - An email will be excluded from scoring only when all the attachments match the keyword exclusions or email subject matches the keyword exclusions. This will be helpful to reduce the email signature noise which commonly contains keyword "image". 2. Keyword exclusions on both target and source file paths - For signals like file copied to removable media, keyword exclusi...

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage Communications Dashboard
Description:
A central hub for corporate communicators and network administrators to access information and manage tasks across the communications lifecycle, starting with campaigns, analytics, leader and audiences, and advanced moderation.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Outlook: FSLogix support for the new Outlook for Windows
Description:
FSLogix support for the new Outlook for Windows includes registering the new Outlook for Windows package by family name and persisting the user data in LocalAppData. It will allow the roaming of user data in new Outlook for non-persistent VDI. #newoutlookforwindows
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365-apps/outlook/get-started/virtualized-desktop-infrastructure
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Outlook: Org Explorer available for all M365 commercial users
Description:
Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will be available in Outlook for all M365 enterprise users, including Microsoft Viva users.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Diagnostics in the new portal
Description:
After further review, this needs to roll back. We apologize for any inconvenience. We are building UX to surface the diagnostics that were previously available through cmdlet to be accessible through portal UX.
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Microsoft Purview eDiscovery - Guest access for export downloads
Description:
This feature allows external guest users to securely access and download export packages from Purview eDiscovery cases, with administrators able to set restrictions such as allowed IP addresses and token expiration to support secure external collaboration.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Recent activity is part of Copilot's dynamic document snapshot in Word
Description:
Select the Activity tab within the Copilot summary at the top of a document for a summary of recent comments and changes. Choose a time window of 3 days, 1 week, or 2 weeks.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Recent activity is part of Copilot's dynamic document snapshot in Word
Description:
Select the Activity tab within the Copilot summary at the top of a document for a summary of recent comments and changes. Choose a time window of 3 days, 1 week, or 2 weeks.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Scope prompts to specific Channels in Teams in Copilot Chat
Description:
Users will be able to scope their prompts to specific Channels in Teams to get more focused responses when using Copilot Chat.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Say "Hey Copilot" to activate voice conversations with the Microsoft 365 Copilot app on Windows
Description:
With the Microsoft 365 Copilot app on Windows, say “Hey Copilot” to activate real-time voice conversations with Copilot. The wake word keeps you in flow, helping you draft content, analyze data, and get critical insights without having to navigate to a separate app or window. Built for enterprise, it respects your organization’s compliance and privacy settings, activating only when called.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Edit and manage Teams Town Hall instances in Outlook
Description:
Organizers and co-organizers can now easily edit the details of Teams Town Hall instances. A direct link to the Teams Town Hall edit page is now accessible from Outlook calendar. This enhancement brings the same seamless editing and registration management experience already available in webinar, bringing a consistent experience across all event types.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Chat now supports more file types in search grounding.
Description:
We are expanding the file types supported in Copilot Chat to align with the Microsoft Search experience.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Apply partial settings for Android devices using configuration profiles in the Teams admin center
Description:
In the Teams admin center, admins can now modify, review, and apply configuration settings to Android devices without overriding other settings ensuring only the desired changes are made.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention- Separate role added for downloading the original file evidence for Endpoint
Description:
Microsoft Purview has introduced a new separate role for downloading the original evidence for endpoint. It is applicable when you try to download the evidence using Purview or XDR portal.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Custom Dictionary
Description:
Tenant administrators can now upload a Custom Dictionary through the M365 Admin Portal's Copilot Settings page to include tenant-specific terminologies. This enhancement improves entity recognition in Teams meeting transcripts, benefiting both Recap and Copilot's understanding of the content.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Outlook: Copilot Prepare for Meeting in Calendar
Description: With so many of us in back-to-back meetings, it can be a real struggle to stay on top of pre-reads, action items, and even what each meeting is about. Copilot can identify and summarize the key points so you can show up prepared in just a few minutes. When you have an upcoming meeting, Copilot proactively shows you a "Prepare" button in your inbox which helps you quickly get context by creating a summary of the meeting and showing and summarizing relevant files, leveraging the power of the Micro...

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference an Excel file when creating a presentation with Copilot for PowerPoint
Description:
You can now reference an Excel file when you create a presentation with Copilot within the PowerPoint application.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference an Excel file when creating a presentation with Copilot for PowerPoint
Description:
You can now reference an Excel file when you create a presentation with Copilot within the PowerPoint application.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference an Excel file when creating a presentation with Copilot for PowerPoint
Description:
You can now reference an Excel file when you create a presentation with Copilot within the PowerPoint application.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Outlook: Add custom sounds for Mail Notifications, Reactions, and Calendar Reminders
Description:
In your Notification settings, you'll be able to add a custom sound for your mail notifications, mail reactions, and calendar notifications (aka reminders). #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Email Attachment Preview in Content Explorer
Description:
This feature allows admins to view the attachments of an email within purview content explorer. This will help admins with their investigation process
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

Title: SharePoint: Time to read on SharePoint News posts
Description:
Each news item in SharePoint will display estimated read time of the article.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: OneDrive: Prompt for permitted users to sign in to OneDrive app with personal Microsoft account
Description: Users have long been able to use personal Microsoft accounts with the OneDrive app on corporate Windows devices—unless restricted by admin policy. This new feature introduces a prompt only when a personal account is already signed in on the device, encouraging users to also sign in to the OneDrive app with that account. Administrators who have already restricted personal accounts on corporate devices can continue to manage this as before. Organizations that have already disabled personal OneDriv...

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot generates the new presentation in a new file when starting from an existing presentation
Description:
Now, when creating a presentation using Copilot from an existing presentation, it will create the new presentation in a new file without affecting the original presentation
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot generates the new presentation in a new file when starting from an existing presentation
Description:
Now, when creating a presentation using Copilot from an existing presentation, it will create the new presentation in a new file without affecting the original presentation
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot generates the new presentation in a new file when starting from an existing presentation
Description:
Now, when creating a presentation using Copilot from an existing presentation, it will create the new presentation in a new file without affecting the original presentation
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint DLP - Edge to enforce USB, network, and printer group restrictions on files
Description:
Purview Admins can now use either Removable USB device, Network Share, and/or Printer groups within DLP policies, these restrictions are now extensible to the Edge browser experience.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Enhancements to global exclusions in IRM settings
Description:
In this update, we are making the below enhancements to Insider Risk Management (IRM) exclusions to reduce alert noise.
1. Keyword logic update for email - An email will be excluded from scoring only when all the attachments match the keyword exclusions or email subject matches the keyword exclusions. This will be helpful to reduce the email signature noise which commonly contains keyword "image".
2. Keyword exclusions on both target and source file paths - For signals like file copied to remova...

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): UX Transparency for Web Queries
Description:
With UX transparency of web grounding in Copilot, users will now be able to see the exact queries sent by Copilot in response to a user's prompt to the web for grounding, along with the list of websites being queried, enhancing their awareness and control over the process.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention- MacOS parity – Full file evidence
Description:
Data Loss Prevention (DLP) can copy the item that matches a DLP policy from onboarded MacOS devices to an Azure storage account. This creates full file evidence parity for MacOS.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot only during call
Description:
Copilot is only available during the live call session and will not be accessible after the call ends. No recording or transcription is required to use Copilot during the call.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Keyword monitoring enhancements
Description:
Network and Verified admins can setup specific keywords to monitor across conversations in their network. The enhancements include a new, modern experience of the existing functionality. Keyword monitoring will now accessible in the new communications dashboard experience within the advanced moderation page. The feature is no longer available in the Engage admin center.
GA date: April CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Theme moderation in Viva Engage
Description:
Network admins and corporate communicators can input custom themes of interest and track new conversations that match these themes. Theme monitoring is accessible in the new communications dashboard experience in the advanced moderation page.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Developers can create, test and update custom engine agents to run in Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams
Description:
We mistakenly marked the roadmap as "launched." The correct status is In Development. We apologize the inconvenience. Developers can create, test and update custom engine agents using Teams Toolkit & Microsoft Copilot Studio, so that they can run in Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft To Do: Microsoft To Do availability in Outlook on the web
Description:
Microsoft To Do will be available from the Outlook on the web app launcher. To Do will replace the tasks module currently available. After this change, you will see To Do in the app launcher instead of tasks.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections - New News feature in Microsoft Teams
Description: This update will replace the current Feed experience in Viva Connections across desktop, mobile, and web platforms with a SharePoint News reader experience. This new experience will present SharePoint news from the organizational sites, boosted news, users' followed sites, frequent sites, and people they work with in an immersive reader experience. This will include a Copilot-powered news summary as well, available only in Teams for Windows desktop in this initial release. February 2025: We inad...

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle separate retention policies for Copilots and AI Apps
Description:
Enable admins to configure retention policies for various Copilots and AI Apps.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

Title: OneNote: Copilot Chat on OneNote for web and in Teams
Description:
Bringing the power of Microsoft Copilot to OneNote for web and in Teams.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Outlook: Org Explorer in Outlook for Mac
Description:
Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will now also be available in Outlook for Mac.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

Title: SharePoint: Auto-run Data Access Governance (DAG) reports
Description:
You can now schedule to run your DAG reports automatically every 28 days and also receive notification when the auto-run completes.
GA date: October CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Skills Scenarios for Leaders in Viva Insights
Description:
With Microsoft 365 Copilot in Viva Insights, leaders can unlock powerful skills insights for their teams—driven by People Skills data. Copilot enables leaders to explore their organization’s skill distribution, identify individuals with specific capabilities, and generate dynamic visual reports to support strategic decision-making.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal - Data Lifecycle Management - Separation of the Microsoft 365 Copilot retention policy location from Microsoft Teams chats
Description:
Today, admins must manage retention and deletion for Microsoft 365 Copilot interactions using a retention policy location that also includes Microsoft Teams chats. This feature will provide a new location option to manage only Copilot interactions, separate from Microsoft Teams chats.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

Title: OneDrive: Hide people previewing files in OneDrive and SharePoint
Description:
This setting will allow administrators to disable the presence feature in the OneDrive and SharePoint file previewing experience on selected sites. This item is inaccurate and is being removed from the roadmap. We apologize for any inconvenience.
GA date: October CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Review set query report
Description:
Within a review set, generate and download a hit-by-term report on a KQL query. Quickly see the count and volume of the items hit on a particular keyword or a list of compound queries.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: SharePoint: Microsoft Syntex - Update to Microsoft Syntex translation
Description:
The document translation service enables users to create translated copies quickly and easily while preserving the original format and structure of the file. We’re updating the service to allow creating translated copies in up to 10 languages with a single request. This update will be available for both manual and rule-based requests.
GA date: October CY2024

Title: SharePoint: Enhancing SharePoint document translation with glossary feature
Description:
We’re thrilled to announce the addition of a glossary capability to our SharePoint AI content document translation model. This feature delivers precise, industry-specific translations, fostering unparalleled clarity and consistency for your documents. Experience effortless integration and user-friendly operation within your existing SharePoint libraries.
GA date: October CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy tuning analysis for priority content-only policies
Description: Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction of the number of users in a tenant that could potentially match a given set of policy conditions. With this update, policy tuning analysis will support insider risk policies that are scoped for priority content. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables cu...

Title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Service health dashboard
Description:
As a Microsoft Purview user, you'll be able to view outages, service issues, and advisories that might impact your services. This new dashboard will combine the services and solutions health of Purview, Microsoft 365 services, and Azure Cloud Services in one central place in the Purview portal, eliminating the need to go to several places to find this information.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat for EDU customers ages 13 and older
Description:
Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat is available at no additional cost for Microsoft 365 EDU users ages 13 and older who sign in with their Microsoft Entra account (no Microsoft 365 Copilot license required). Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat offers enterprise data protection (EDP), and secure AI chat, powered by the latest large language models with optional web grounding. Admins must take action to enable access.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference an Excel file when creating a slide with Copilot for PowerPoint
Description:
You can now reference an Excel file when you create a slide with Copilot for PowerPoint.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Lists in Context IQ
Description:
Users will be able to search for and select SharePoint Lists through the Context IQ menu to help ground their prompts when using Copilot Chat.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: SQL-like commands in the search bar
Description:
Efficiently narrow down your search results by using SQL-like commands in the search bar. Users can quickly filter messages, files, or conversations with precise queries such as from:username, with:username or in:channel.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Outlook: Show teammates' calendars in the left navigation pane
Description:
Users can now see their teammates' calendars (including peers, direct reports, and managers) automatically displayed in the left navigation pane of the new outlook. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Edge: Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat Summarization in Edge for Business Context Menu
Description:
Microsoft Edge for Business plans to introduce a Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat summarization menu item to our context menu. This feature will help users quickly unpack and ask questions about their open page.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updates to Copilot Chat response output
Description:
Easily interact with Microsoft Graph content represented by bolder references, new action bar, and more.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker attribution now  “On” by default in BYOD rooms with enhanced admin controls
Description:
New PowerShell setting (SpeakerAttributionBYOD in csTeamsAIPolicy), enabled by default, gives IT admins more control over speaker attribution in BYOD (bring your own device) meeting rooms. This enhances the experience for users by enabling clear speaker labels and richer in-meeting and post-meeting insights with Microsoft 365 Copilot. Users just enroll profiles via Teams Settings to be recognized.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Search with apps and agents personalized suggestionss
Description:
We are enhancing Teams search personalized suggestions to include apps and agents. When searching in Teams you will now also get apps and agent suggestions which dynamically update as you type.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Read aloud available in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat
Description:
Play back Copilot responses as audio with read aloud in Copilot Chat.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Dictate your prompts in Copilot Chat
Description:
Use the dictation button to input your prompts with speech.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint Sites
Description:
Users will be able to search for and select SharePoint Sites in CIQ to scope their prompts to.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint and OneDrive Folders
Description:
Users will be able to select SharePoint and ODSP Folders from the new "Attach cloud files" experience in CIQ to scope their prompts to.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Unified video branded start page
Description:
This creates a unified Clipchamp and Stream start page that serves as a single video destination of creation, consumption, and discovery.
GA date: December CY2024
